SummaryEnglish: When a shapeshifting enemy known as Gnosia infiltrates a lone spaceship, the crew has only one way to survive: identify the imposter each day and put them into cryo-sleep. But for Yuri, the day never ends. Trapped in a time loop, she relives the first day of the crisis over and over. To escape, Yuri must uncover the truth behind Gnosia and the time loop itself—before it’s too late.

1.SummaryEnglish: Yuri, who has lost their memory, wakes up aboard the Interstellar Cruiser D.Q.O. They are taken by Setsu to participate in a meeting to identify the "Gnosia," a being that attacks and annihilates humans.

2.SummaryEnglish: Yuri, who looped back to the first day, attends the meeting knowing who the Gnosia is. Yuri tries to cast suspicion on SQ, but the discussion doesn't progress as expected...?
